name: Monisha Krishnareddy
title: Senior AI/ML Engineer
professional_summary: I am having 10 years of experience in AI/ML engineering across Healthcare, Government, Retail, and Consulting domains, with expertise in developing and deploying machine learning models that solve complex business problems.

Developed predictive models using TensorFlow and PyTorch to identify patients at high risk for chronic conditions, enabling early intervention and personalized care plans that improved health outcomes.

Built natural language processing models for government agencies that automated document classification and sentiment analysis, enabling faster processing of citizen feedback and improved service delivery.
Created recommendation systems for retail clients that increased customer engagement and sales by analyzing purchasing patterns and providing personalized product suggestions.
Designed data pipelines that processed and transformed large volumes of structured and unstructured data from multiple sources, ensuring clean and reliable data for machine learning models.
Applied deep learning techniques to image recognition tasks in healthcare settings, assisting medical professionals in diagnosing conditions from medical imaging with improved accuracy.
Implemented MLOps practices to automate model training, testing, and deployment processes, reducing the time from development to production and ensuring model reliability.
Worked with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions, ensuring alignment between machine learning initiatives and organizational goals.
Optimized machine learning models for performance and scalability, addressing challenges related to computational resources and real-time processing requirements.
Utilized cloud computing platforms to deploy and manage machine learning applications, taking advantage of scalable infrastructure and specialized AI services.
Developed custom algorithms for anomaly detection in financial transactions, helping consulting clients identify potential fraud and improve security measures.
Applied feature engineering techniques to extract meaningful insights from raw data, improving model performance and interpretability for business stakeholders.
Created data visualization dashboards that presented model results and business metrics in an intuitive format, enabling data-driven decision making across organizations.
Conducted thorough testing and validation of machine learning models to ensure accuracy, fairness, and compliance with industry regulations and ethical standards.
Collaborated with data engineers to design and implement efficient data storage solutions that supported the requirements of advanced analytics and machine learning workloads.
Mentored junior team members in machine learning best practices and technical skills, fostering knowledge sharing and professional development within the organization.
Stayed current with emerging technologies and techniques in artificial intelligence and machine learning, continuously improving skills and incorporating new approaches into projects.
Communicated complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, ensuring understanding and buy-in for machine learning initiatives and their business impact.

responsibilities: Developed predictive models using TensorFlow and PyTorch to identify patients at high risk for chronic conditions, enabling early intervention and personalized care plans that improved health outcomes.

Implemented natural language processing algorithms to analyze clinical notes and extract relevant medical information, reducing manual documentation time for healthcare providers by approximately 30%.
Built an automated triage system that prioritized patient cases based on urgency and available resources, optimizing workflow efficiency and reducing wait times for critical care services.
Created anomaly detection algorithms to identify unusual patterns in patient data, helping medical professionals spot potential health issues before they became serious problems.
Designed and deployed a recommendation engine for personalized treatment plans, considering patient history, genetic factors, and lifestyle to suggest the most effective interventions.
Worked with cross-functional teams to ensure HIPAA compliance throughout the machine learning pipeline, implementing robust data anonymization and security measures to protect patient privacy.
Optimized machine learning models for real-time processing of medical imaging data, enabling faster diagnosis and treatment planning for radiologists and other specialists.

Developed a system to predict patient readmission risks, allowing healthcare providers to implement targeted interventions and reduce unnecessary hospitalizations, improving both patient outcomes and cost efficiency.
Applied transfer learning techniques to adapt existing models for new healthcare applications, reducing development time and improving performance on specialized medical tasks.
Created a dashboard using Tableau to visualize model predictions and key health metrics, providing healthcare administrators with actionable insights for resource allocation and strategic planning.
Implemented MLOps practices using Docker and Kubernetes to automate model deployment and monitoring, ensuring consistent performance and quick identification of issues in production environments.

Conducted regular model audits to ensure fairness and eliminate bias in healthcare predictions, working with ethics committees to maintain high standards of equitable care across all patient demographics.
Collaborated with medical professionals to validate model predictions against clinical expertise, ensuring that AI recommendations aligned with established medical best practices and guidelines.
Utilized AWS SageMaker for model training and deployment, taking advantage of specialized healthcare AI services and maintaining compliance with industry regulations for cloud-based systems.
Developed custom algorithms for processing electronic health records (EHRs), handling complex data structures and inconsistencies to create clean datasets for machine learning applications.

Participated in code reviews and knowledge sharing sessions with the data science team, contributing to continuous improvement of development practices and technical capabilities within the healthcare AI domain.
Built machine learning models to predict traffic patterns and optimize public transportation schedules, reducing commute times and improving overall efficiency of the state's transit system.
Developed natural language processing solutions to analyze citizen feedback from various channels, identifying common concerns and trends to inform policy decisions and service improvements.
Created classification algorithms to automatically categorize and route government documents, streamlining administrative processes and reducing manual processing time by approximately 40%.
Implemented predictive models to identify areas at high risk for natural disasters, enabling proactive resource allocation and emergency response planning to protect communities and infrastructure.
Designed a system to detect fraudulent activities in government programs, analyzing patterns in claims and applications to identify suspicious behavior and prevent financial losses.

Applied machine learning techniques to optimize energy consumption in state facilities, identifying opportunities for efficiency improvements and cost savings while maintaining comfort and functionality.
Developed recommendation systems to help citizens find relevant government services based on their needs and circumstances, improving access to support and increasing program utilization.
Created models to predict maintenance needs for public infrastructure, allowing for proactive repairs that extended asset lifespans and reduced overall maintenance costs for the state.

Built ETL processes to extract data from legacy systems, transform it according to business requirements, and load it into modern data warehouses for improved accessibility and performance.

Created data quality frameworks that automatically validated, cleaned, and standardized incoming data, reducing errors and improving the reliability of analytics and reporting systems.
